fixes.name: Profit RAG
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR totalProfit = SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit])
RETURN
IF(
    totalProfit < 60000,
    1,
    IF(
        totalProfit >= 60000 && totalProfit <= 80000,
        2,
        3
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced SUM([Profit]) with SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]) and used a VAR for the aggregated value, then applied nested IF to mirror the Tableau conditional logic.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
